title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to provide procedures
governing those who: (a) sell or offer
for sale; (b) construct or offer to
construct; or
(c) alter or improve
or who offer to alter or improve any area or portion of a building, structure
or other real property in order to provide any facility to reduce the intensity
of fallout radiation. It is also intended to prevent deceptive and fraudulent
advertising and to protect the public from being victimized by such advertising
of fallout shelters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
